glsa.title: Pure-FTPd: Potential DoS when maximum connections is reached
glsa.synopsis: Pure-FTPd contains a bug potentially allowing a Denial of Service attack when the maximum number of connections is reached.

background.p: Pure-FTPd is a fast, production-quality and standards-compliant FTP server.

description.p: Pure-FTPd contains a bug in the accept_client function handling the setup of new connections.

impact.p: When the maximum number of connections is reached an attacker could exploit this vulnerability to perform a Denial of Service attack.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time. All users are encouraged to upgrade to the latest available version.

resolution.p: All Pure-FTPd users should upgrade to the latest stable version:
